channel.title: Email communication
channel.description: i was thinking is there a way in java to communicate with a smtp/pop server. sending or receiving. ive search the web but cant find anything. this sort of doesnt go in this section, sorry but there isn't really a place for this question. well after a little research i think i found the answer. Javamail. thx for all the help.
